name: Hit and Blow
description:
In this game your goal is to guess the correct sequence.

The code is hidden from you and the only way to get it right is by trial and error. 

To help you out, for each trial you will be shown how close the guess was.

A bright green dot means that the there is a correct color in a right position.

A dark green dot means the color is right but the in a wrong place. 

A black dot means a wrong color in you guess. 

Make your initial guess and work out to find the solution!!

Languages:

English
Spanish
French
German
Portuguese
Italian
